jira.description: GIVEN a {{TicketMerchandisingModule}} on a {{Surface}}

steps.action:
WHEN the module is ~50% visible in the scroll view
AND this is the first time the module has been 50% visible on the {{Surface}}
steps.result: THEN a tracking event should be fired

steps.action: WHEN the {{TicketMerchandisingModule}} has already been tracked
steps.result: THEN a tracking event should not be fired again

steps.action: WHEN the {{Surface}} is reloaded via pull-to-refresh (or otherwise)
steps.result: THEN a tracking event should fire again once the {{TicketMerchandisingModule}} is 50% visible

jira.summary: MLB.tv - module stops playing after removal

steps.action:
GIVEN a surface with an MLBTV module
WHEN the MLBTV module is removed from the surface
steps.result: THEN the MLBTV module should stop playing

steps.action:
GIVEN a logged in user watching MLBTV on a Surface
WHEN the user logs out
steps.result: THEN the MLBTV module should be removed and stop playing

steps.action:
GIVEN a logged in user watching MLBTV on a Surface
WHEN the user refreshes
AND receives a Surface without MLBTV
steps.result: THEN the MLBTV module should be removed should stop playing

jira.description: GIVEN I am seeing the favorite team snapshot

steps.action:
WHEN the product links are available

AND I click on the Tickets or Story product link
steps.result: THEN the proper analytics event should be fired

steps.action:
WHEN the FGOTD is available for my favorite team

AND I am logged in (regardless of entitlement)

AND my favorite team’s game is Live
steps.result: THEN stream the FGOTD in the video player on Home

steps.action:
WHEN the FGOTD is available for my favorite team

AND I am logged in (regardless of entitlement)

AND my favorite team’s game is Live

AND I am in the blackout region for that team
steps.result: THEN I will *not* receive the stream of the FGOTD in the video player on Home when that game is live

steps.action:
WHEN the FGOTD is available but not for my favorite team

AND I am logged in (regardless of entitlement)
steps.result: THEN I will *not* receive the stream of the FGOTD in the video player on Home when that game is live

steps.action:
WHEN the FGOTD is available

AND I am logged out
steps.result: THEN I should receive the *Gameday Mini* experience for just my Favorite Team when they are live (as normal)

steps.action:

steps.action: GIVEN that I scroll home or news
steps.result: THEN the the rest of the modules should be loaded

jira.summary: POTG - notification automatically added for followed team
jira.description:
GIVEN a user is going through Onboarding
AND the user has selected a followed team
IF they get to the notification page and opt-into Game notifications for their followed team
THEN POTG will be added as part of the default Game package and be defaulted to on

*Note that the Game notification bundle is defaulted to off for Followed teams, a user will need to opt-in to Game notifications for their Followed Team(s) in order to have POTG enabled.

steps.action: IF they get to the notification page and opt-into Game notifications for their followed team
steps.result: THEN POTG will be added as part of the default Game package and be defaulted to on

results.definition:

AND the user has selected a followed team

steps.action: IF they get to the notification page and opt-into Game notifications for their favorite team

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user launches an audio-only stream without any alternate spanish broadcasts available to listen to
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has their device set to Spanish
steps.result:
THEN

+ The home stream should begin playback after initial launch

OR

+ The favorited team's audio broadcast should begin playback after initial launch (Away or Home)

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user launches an audio feed from the Audio EPG (Live or Archived)
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has their device language set to Spanish
steps.result:
THEN

+ If available, the Spanish broadcast will begin play back after initial launch

AND

+ If the user has a favorited team in the audio-only stream

THEN

+ The favorited team's spanish broadcast should begin playback after initial launch

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user launches an audio feed for a game that is nationally broadcasted
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user does not have a favorited team saved in their app settings
steps.result:
THEN

+ The national feed should begin playback

jira.summary: Matchup without a pregame or postgame

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user launches an audio feed for a matchup without a pregame or postgame
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user does not have a favorited team saved
steps.result:
THEN

+ The home feed should play after initial launch

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Launching an audio-only stream from the Audio EPG

AND

+ The game mhas two pregames or two postgames
steps.action:
GIVEN 

+ The user does not have a favorited team in their app settings
steps.result:
THEN

+ The initial launch should play back the home broadcast

steps.data:
WHEN

+ A game has an audio stream for a pre-game or a postgame
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The User does not have a favorited team 

AND

+ The user navigates to the Audio EPG
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user should playback the live stream (Home or Away) that has the pre-game or postgame

AND

+ The archived stream should not launch initially.

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the Audio EPG menu

AND

+ Launches the national broadcast stream
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has a favorited team that is playing in a national broadcast game
steps.result:
THEN

+ Playback will begin successfully (One Stream)

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user launches a game that features two followed teams
steps.action:
GIVEN 

+ The user has multiple teams followed in their app settings

AND

+ The user navigates to the Audio EPG to launch an audio-only stream
steps.result:
THEN

+ The home stream will begin playback at initial launch

steps.data:
WHEN 

+ Launching a live or archived audio stream from the audio EPG menu that features the followed team
steps.action:
GIVEN 

+ The user has a team followed in their app settings
steps.result:
THEN 

+ The followed team's audio stream should begin playback on initial launch (Home or Away)

steps.data:

steps.action:
GIVEN 

+ The user has a team favorited in their app settings
steps.result:
THEN 

+ The favorited team's audio stream should begin playback on initial launch (Home or Away)

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The audio stream has entered an ad break
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream and has received successful playback
steps.result:
THEN

1. The advertisement volume should not be significantly lower or louder than the game playback volume

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The game goes to a commercial break whether it's between innings or half innings

AND

1. Game playback is about to resume
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream and has received successful playback
steps.result:
THEN

1. The commercial break will end 

AND

1. Audio playback of the game will resume without the user missing a play

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The game goes to a commercial break whether it's between inning's or half innings
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream and has received successful playback
steps.result:
THEN

1. Advertisement playback will begin

AND

1. The user will not hear any audio from the ballpark

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user puts their device to sleep
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream
steps.result:
THEN

1. The user will still receive audio playback without an issues

AND

1. The audio feed does not pause or stop

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user backgrounds the app and navigates to another app on their device
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user is listening to an audio feed in the MLB app
steps.result:
THEN

1. The user will still receive audio playback without an issues 

AND

1. The audio feed does not pause or stop unless audio from another app begins playback

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user observes the player controls available on the EPG menu
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio feed and receives successful playback
steps.result:
THEN

1. The user is able to:

- FF and RW by 10 seconds
- Play and Pause the feed
- Scrub backwards and forwards
- Tap Live button if away from live point
- Change feeds
- User calendar date picker buttons

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the Audio EPG icon (Headphones) from the top-right of the app
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user has logged into an account with Audio EPG entitlements
steps.result:
THEN

1. The user will receive playback of their selected game

AND

1. The user can switch audio feeds by selecting an alternative audio segment

AND

1. The user will receive successful playback of the new feed selected

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the Audio EPG icon (Headphones) from the top-right of the app and selects a matchup
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user has logged into an account with Audio EPG entitlements
steps.result:
THEN 

1. The user will receive playback of their selected game

AND

1. Their favorite team OR the home team feed will be prioritized

AND

1. The Spanish feed will be prioritized if the user has their device language set to Spanish

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the Audio EPG icon (Headphones) from the top-right of the app
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user has logged into an account with Audio EPG entitlements
steps.result:
THEN

1. The Audio EPG menu will drop down

AND

1. The user is able to view games in the past, present, and future by utilizing the < and > buttons

AND

1. The user receives successful playback of archived and live games selected

jira.summary: Headline Stack - Spots - Minor League Baseball
jira.description:
GIVEN a content piece (Article, Video, VSM Content)
WHEN the content is tagged with minor-league-baseball
AND is not tagged with a single team or world baseball classic tag
Format:

{
"__typename": "TaxonomyTag",
"slug": "minor-league-baseball"
}
THEN render the MiLB spot next to the headline

Spot display priority for reference:
1. World Baseball Classic Tag (world baseball classic)
2. Team Tag (Only one team tag)
3. Minor League Baseball Tag (minor league baseball)
4. Player Tag (Only one player tag)
5. Major League Baseball Tag (Default/Fallback)

steps.action:
WHEN the content is tagged with minor-league-baseball
AND is not tagged with a single team or world baseball classic tag
steps.result: THEN render the MiLB spot next to the headline

jira.summary: Jewel - Duplicate Live Activities are not triggered with Push to Start and Manual Flow
jira.description:
GIVEN the user has auto-track enabled for their favorite team
AND the user has a device with OS >= 17.2
AND the user is on the scoreboard
WHEN the user’s favorite team or All-Star game is playing
AND the user has manually triggered a Live Activity for their favorite team or All-Star game
WHEN the game enters Warmup state
THEN they will NOT receive a duplicate Live Activity via Push to Start

steps.action:

WHEN the game enters Warmup state

jira.summary: Jewel - Default Track Button State for Users with OS >= 17.2 (Push to Start Eligible)
jira.description:
GIVEN the user has auto-track enabled for their favorite team
AND the user has a device with OS >= 17.2
AND the user is on the scoreboard
WHEN the user’s favorite team or All-Star game is playing
THEN the user is presented the track button for live activities beginning 4.5 hours before game start time
AND the track button is defaulted to disabled
Note: In this case, the user will receive a Push to Start notification once the game enters Warmup state (Core team explicitly disabled the legacy Live Activity Autotrack flow is a user is Push to Start eligible). Assuming a user accepts the Live Activity notification, once they re-open Scoreboard, the Track Game button will show as Enabled for that particular game).

steps.action: WHEN the user’s favorite team or All-Star game is playing
steps.result:
THEN the user is presented the track button for live activities beginning 4.5 hours before game start time
AND the track button is defaulted to disabled

results.definition:
GIVEN the user has auto-track enabled for their favorite team
AND the user has a device with OS >= 17.2
AND the user is on the scoreboard

jira.summary: Location Permissions-> Implicitly automated by way of standard running

steps.action:
GIVEN a user launches a fresh install of the app
 
 WHEN the user reaches the favorite team selector
 
 THEN the user should be presented with a location permissions popup
 
 
 
 GIVEN a user launching a fresh install of the MLB app
 
 WHEN the user denies location permission at the favorite team selector
 
 AND then attempts to watch a game stream
 
 THEN the user should be prompted with another location prompt
 
 AND when the user denies that prompt they should see a "Location not enabled" screen with an "Enable" button that will take them to the App Info page for MLB where they can enable location permissions (screenshot below)
 
 
 
 NOTE: There is a known bug where the "Location not enabled, please enable location to continue" text does not currently display. This is currently expected, so do not mark this test as failed for this bug. Delete this note when the bug has been addressed.
 
 
 
 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/11778237)

1. WHEN the user taps the MLB Audio option
 
 AND purchases the subscription through the Play Store purchase flow
 
 2. WHEN the MLB Audio user then accesses the MLB.tv paywall
 
 AND purchases MLB.tv Monthly successfully
 
 AND then links to a MLB account from the "Follow the Game Wherever You Go" screen
 
 3. WHEN the user uninstalls the build
 
 AND reinstalls the build
 
 
 
 
 
 4. WHEN the user installs the build on another device
 
 AND launches the app
 
 AND accesses a paywall
 
 AND logs in with their MLB account (FROM STEP 2)
steps.result:
1. THEN the transaction is successful
 
 AND the user can dismiss the "Follow the Game Wherever You Go" screen
 
 AND the user will have MLB Audio access (Ex. Gameday Audio)
 
 AND the user will not see Lite ads 
 
 2. THEN the user will have access to MLB.tv and Gameday Audio
 
 AND the user will not see Lite ads 
 
 AND the MLB account will display in purchases
 
 3. THEN the App will automatically restore the purchase for the user 
 
 AND the user's purchases (MLB Audio Monthly and MLB.tv Monthly) will be restored
 
 AND the user will have MLB Audio and MLB.tv access
 
 4. THEN the user will have access to MLB Audio and MLB.tv

steps.data: When the user launches the MLB App via CarPlay
steps.action:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is not entitled for MLB Audio
steps.result: Then the user receives a message that an Audio subscription is required

steps.data:
When the user is listening to an audio feed via CarPlay
and has paused the feed via the Pause button
and taps on the Play button
steps.action:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
steps.result: Then the audio feed will resume playback

steps.data:
When the user is listening to an audio feed via CarPlay
and taps the Pause button
steps.action:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
steps.result: Then the audio feed will pause

steps.data:
When the user has selected a game from the game list
and is viewing the available audio feeds for that game
and taps on a feed
steps.action:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
steps.result:
Then a screen with the game matchup and feed details will appear
and the feed will start playing on the CarPlay

steps.data: When the user taps on a game from the list in the CarPlay display
steps.action:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
steps.result: Then the next screen will display the available audio feeds for that game

steps.data:
When there are audio feeds available on a given day
and the user is viewing the list of game matchups on the CarPlay display
steps.action:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
steps.result: Then the user will see the correct team logos, names, and inning information for each game

steps.data: When there are audio feeds available on a given day
steps.action:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
steps.result: Then the user will see a list of the game matchups on the CarPlay display

steps.data:
When there are no audio feeds available yet on a given day
and the user views the CarPlay display
steps.action:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
steps.result: Then the user will see a message that there are no audio feeds available

steps.data: When the user taps on the MLB app icon on the CarPlay display
steps.action:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
steps.result:
Then the MLB app launches on the device
and the available feeds are listed on the CarPlay display

steps.data: When the user connects the device to CarPlay
steps.action:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the user is in a car that supports CarPlay
steps.result:
Then the user will see a CarPlay splash screen on the device
and the MLB app available on the CarPlay display

and the user will be able to port the subscription to other device

WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch an archive game broadcast that includes their single-team

+ A user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements
steps.result:
THEN

+ Video playback of the single-team's TV broadcast will begin without issues

jira.summary: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Free Game of the Day

steps.data:
WHEN

+ There is a live or archived free game of the day available on the schedule

AND

+ The user attempts to launch the broadcast
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements
steps.result:
THEN

+ Video playback begins as expected

AND

+ The user does not receive a non-entitled message

jira.summary: MLB.TV Single Team Package - National Blackout

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The single-team is playing in a game that is being nationally broadcasted (ESPN)

AND

+ The user attempts to launch the national broadcast
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements
steps.result:
THEN

+ A Blackout restriction message will appear at launch

AND

+ The user will be unable to watch the broadcast until 90 minutes after the game ends.

jira.summary: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Local (In-market) Blackout

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The single-team is within the user's local market

AND

+ The user attempts to launch a game with their team playing
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements
steps.result:
THEN

+ A Blackout restriction message will appear at launch

AND

+ The user will be unable to watch the broadcast until 90 minutes after the game ends.

+ The user views the "Game Data" section of the stats view

- HBP

- Pitches-strikes
- Groundouts-flyouts

- Wind
- First pitch

- Att
- Venue
- Date

PLAYER IP H R ER BB K HR ERA

steps.result:

To link your MLB.tv account to a participating pay TV provider, visit MLB.tv/postseason. Live audio and full game archives are available with a valid MLB.tv subscription 90 minutes after the conclusion of the game."
+ An OK button to navigate out of the modal view

steps.action:
GIVEN

+ A user that is signed in or out of the app has navigated to the Watch tab
steps.result:
THEN

+ A modal will display with the copy, "This exclusive MLB broadcast is available for Free in HD on [partner name]"

AND

+ There is a button which allows users to deeplink into the partner app

AND

+ An option to Listen on MLB At Bat which deeplinks the user to the Audio-Only EPG

AND

+ An option to Follow in Gameday which sends the user to that game's Gameday page.

steps.data: WHEN the user selects the game
steps.action:
GIVEN a game with no feeds available
AND the game is in progress or the game is final
steps.result: THEN the No Feeds Available Modal is displayed

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The game is not available for the user at the moment when it is launched

OR

+ Broadcasts for a live game are available to launch
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user taps on a game tile from the Watch tab (Watch Now or Games segments)
steps.result:
THEN

+ A modal is displayed for the user with an error message or watch options 

AND

+ If on an iPad, the modal will be centered on the screen

OR

+ If on an iPhone, the modal will display as a bottom sheet on screen

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The game has not yet been moved to LIVE or MEDIA_ON (No feeds available)

EX: Future time, date
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user taps on a game tile from the Watch tab (Watch Now or Games segments)
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user will observe a modal that states, "You're a bit too early", and copy underneath which reads, “There are no feeds available. Please come back later to tune in."

jira.summary: Audio Only - Log In to Playback

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The User attempts to launch audio playback for a game from a game tile, Audio button, or Audio EPG button
steps.action:
GIVEN

The user is not logged into an entitled account

AND

The user is navigating the app from the

- Watch Tab
- Scores Tab
- Home Tab
- Gameday
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user will observe a paywall

AND

+ The user can log in with an entitled account

AND

+ The user will be sent to the Audio EPG page after a successful login attempt

AND

+ The user can select the game for immediate audio playback

jira.summary: Promo Code Redemption With MLB App Downloaded

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the app store on the device and hits the account button in the upper-right corner
+ The user pushes "Redeem Gift Card or Code" and then selects "Enter Code Manually"
+ The user inputs one of the promo codes they generated
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user generates prod facing promo code this is done through app store connect (services -> Promo Codes) https://appstoreconnect.apple.com/apps/493619333/features/promo_codes/generate

AND

+ The user has the app downloaded
+ The app must be submitted to Apple for review to be able to begin this test
+ The user navigates to the app store connect and creates promo codes for the appropriate build
steps.result:
THEN

+ The app will automatically open

jira.summary: Promo Code Redemption Without MLB App Downloaded

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the app store on the device and hits the account button in the upper upper-right corner 
+ The user pushes "Redeem Gift Card or Code" and then selects "Enter Code Manually"
+ The user inputs one of the promo codes they generated
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ User generates prod facing promo code this is done through app store connect (services -> Promo Codes) https://appstoreconnect.apple.com/apps/493619333/features/promo_codes/generate
+ User does NOT have the app downloaded 
+ App must be submitted to apple for review to be able to begin this test
+ User navigates to app store connect and creates promo codes for the appropriate build
steps.result:
THEN

+ The app will automatically download and open

steps.data:
WHEN 

+ Navigating to the app settings page and selecting the "Restore Purchase" option
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has an active MLB app subscription linked to their Apple ID
steps.result:
THEN

+ A "Success" message will display stating that an existing subscription has been restored and an "Okay" button

AND

+ Users will receive playback of all content they are entitled to

AND

+ Lock icons will dismiss from subscription content avaialable

steps.data:

+ Asked to link their purchase to an MLB account

GIVEN

+ A user has completed a successful IAP of either the MLB.tv, At Bat, or MLBN subscription
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user can either log into an account that has already been create or may create a new account to link the purchase to

AND

+ The user will signed in after either inputting their login credentials and selecting "Log In" or inputting new credentials and selecting "Create Account"

OR

+ An error message is displayed if requirements aren't met for email or password

OR

+ The user can elect to skip account linking entirely and utilize the app as an anonymous user

or

AND

AND

Given

steps.data:

GIVEN

steps.result:
THEN

+ Tap the "Done" button on the top-right if the user wishes to exit the Log In page and return to the paywall

OR

THEN

AND

AND

+ When tapped, subscriber content will bring up the mlb.tv paywall

jira.summary: GDM - Jewel event live with favorite team participating
jira.description:
GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping
WHEN the event is live
AND my favorite is also live
AND my favorite team is playing in the jewel event
THEN I should see live mode
AND I should see gameday mini or mlb.tv for my favorite team based on eligibility
AND I should see any jewel event branding in gameday mini

steps.action:
WHEN the event is live
AND my favorite is also live
AND my favorite team is playing in the jewel event
steps.result:
THEN I should see live mode
AND I should see gameday mini or mlb.tv for my favorite team based on eligibility
AND I should see any jewel event branding in gameday mini

results.definition: GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping

jira.summary: GDM - Jewel event and favorite team game live
jira.description:
GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping
WHEN the event is live
AND my favorite is also live
AND My favorite team is not playing in the jewel event
THEN I should see live mode AND I should see gameday mini or mlb.tv for my favorite team based on eligibility
AND I should not see any jewel event branding in gameday mini

steps.action:
WHEN the event is live
AND my favorite is also live
AND My favorite team is not playing in the jewel event
steps.result:
THEN I should see live mode AND I should see gameday mini or mlb.tv for my favorite team based on eligibility
AND I should not see any jewel event branding in gameday mini

results.definition: GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping

jira.summary: GDM - Jewel Event live, favorite team game not live
jira.description:
GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping
WHEN the event is live
AND my favorite team is not live
THEN I should see live mode
AND I should get gameday mini for that event based on eligibility
AND I should see any jewel event branding in gameday mini

steps.action:
WHEN the event is live
AND my favorite team is not live
steps.result:
THEN I should see live mode
AND I should get gameday mini for that event based on eligibility
AND I should see any jewel event branding in gameday mini

results.definition: GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping

jira.summary: GDM - Jewel Event and Favorite team game not live
jira.description:
GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping
WHEN the event is not live
AND my favorite team is not live
THEN I should not see live mode

steps.action:
WHEN the event is not live
AND my favorite team is not live
steps.result: THEN I should not see live mode

results.definition: GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping

jira.description: GIVEN the user has launched an RSN Live linear stream from the hero

steps.action:
WHEN the user observes calls to

* Media Gateway ([media-gateway.mlb.com|http://media-gateway.mlb.com])
steps.result: THEN a POST call will be made which includes a {{PlaybackResponse}} with relevant data included

steps.action: WHEN the user observes calls to [pubads.g.doubleclick.net|http://pubads.g.doubleclick.net] at the start of video playback
steps.result:
THEN a POST call will be made with a streamId provided
AND an associated Google Ad Manager (GAM) session can be observed for this session (MASN/MASN2 will be a blank sessions under the current implementation (update this case when ads are enabled and bids are successful)) by inputting the streamId
eg: [https://admanager.google.com/2605#/videocontent/stream_activity_monitor/203edc98-3539-4300-b5c2-8c2114dafbd4:DLS|https://admanager.google.com/2605#/videocontent/stream_activity_monitor/203edc98-3539-4300-b5c2-8c2114dafbd4:DLS]

steps.action:
WHEN the uesr observes calls to 

* Google DAI ([dai.google.com|http://dai.google.com])
steps.result: THEN dai calls will occur intermittently throughout playback

steps.action: WHEN the tester sets the configuration so that the app reports to Touchstone (Conviva)
steps.result: THEN the tester will see associated information for the RSN feed in Touchstone

steps.action:
WHEN the uesr observes calls to 

* Adobe ([ans.mlb.com|http://ans.mlb.com])
steps.result: THEN a VIdeo Start event will fire when the video begins (Look in the Form section of the request)

steps.action:
WHEN the uesr observes calls to

* Heartbeat Session ID ([playback-heartbeat.mlb.com|http://playback-heartbeat.mlb.com])
steps.result: THEN a heartbeat call will occur every 60 seconds during playback

jira.description: GIVEN an MASN/MASN2 entitled user that gets the In Market Stream

steps.action: WHEN the user plays the Live Linear stream
steps.result:
WHEN the user plays the Live Linear stream
THEN the VOD player will play the live feed with a limited window of the stream available
AND Jump to Live, CC, and PiP buttons will be actionable and functional
AND the user will have some ability to scrub (within the window)

jira.description: GIVEN and MASN/MASN2 entitled user

steps.action: WHEN the user observes the hero tile
steps.result:
THEN a title will be present
AND a subtitle will be present
AND a live badge will be present
AND a background image will display on the hero tile

steps.action: WHEN the user selects the hero tile
steps.result:
THEN the content will play back successfully
AND the content will be in-market content for in-market users
AND the content will be out-of-market for out-of-market users

jira.description: GIVEN a MASN/MASN2 entitled user

steps.action: WHEN the user observes the RSN carousels
steps.result:
THEN carousel title will be present
AND tile titles will be present
AND an image will populate the tile
AND a duration will be present if the game is not live
AND a live badge will display with no duration if the game is live (NOTE THIS LAST EXPECTED BEHAVIOR IS NOT CURRENTLY IMPLEMENTED. IGNORE FOR NOW DELETE THIS COMMENT ONCE THIS IS IMPLEMENTED.)

steps.action: WHEN the user selects carousel content
steps.result:
THEN the content will playback without issue
AND the user will be able to action controls with expected behaviors (Scrubbing, CC, PiP)

jira.summary: MASN/MASN2 Menu item- logged out user
jira.description: GIVEN a logged out user

steps.action: WHEN the user observes the top menu bar
steps.result: THEN the SNY/SNLA RSN menu item is NOT displayed in the top menu

jira.description: GIVEN a user that is NOT entitled to the SNY/SNLA RSN content

steps.action: WHEN the user logs in
steps.result: THEN the MASN/MASN2 RSN menu item is NOT displayed in the top menu

jira.description: GIVEN a user that is entitled to the SNY/SNLA RSN content

steps.action: WHEN the user logs in
steps.result: THEN the MASN/MASN2 RSN menu item is displayed in the top menu

AND Jump to Live, CC, and PiP buttons will be actionable and functional
AND the user will have some ability to scrub (within the window)
AND the user will be able to PLAY/PAUSE the video

steps.action: WHEN the user selects the hero tile

jira.summary: SNY/SNLA Menu item- logged out user

steps.action: WHEN the user observes the top menu bar
steps.result: THEN the SNY/SNLA RSN menu item is NOT displayed in the top menu

steps.action:
WHEN the user is logged in

jira.summary: Ensure all areas of the app show current day's games

steps.data:
WHEN the user views the games displayed on:

Home Tab (with favorite team)
Games Tab
steps.action: GIVEN the user has confirmed the scoreboard flip for their timezone
steps.result: THEN the games and content displayed match what is displayed on the Home and Games pages when the scoreboard flipped at 10 AM Eastern Standard Time (New York)

jira.summary: HST Scoreboard Flip - At 10 AM EST (NY)

steps.data: WHEN the tester views the Games or Home tab
steps.action:
GIVEN the tester is located in the Hawaii Standard Time zone

AND the current time in their location is AT 10 AM EST (New York) - (AT 4 AM HST)
steps.result:
THEN the user will see the scoreboard on the Games or Home page flip to the current day
AND all scheduled games appear

steps.result: THEN the user will see the scoreboard on the Games or Home page display the previous day's completed games

steps.data:
WHEN

Selecting the Yearly or Monthly offer with a promotional offer
steps.action:
GIVEN

The user has launched an MLBTV Paywall that includes SKU’s with free-trial promotional offers

AND

The user has once before redeemed a free-trial offer
steps.result:
THEN

The user will see a redemption message to confirm a 3-day free trial promotional offer

AND

The user will be charged the regular price of the selected SKU after their 3-day promo offer expires

steps.data:
WHEN

Selecting the free-trial SKU with 7-day free trial (Intro)
steps.action:
GIVEN

The user launches the MLBTV Paywall Page

AND

A Free Trial SKU is offered for a Yearly or Monthly Option
steps.result:
THEN

The user will receive a message stating that their free-trial will end in 7-days

AND

After the trial ends the user will be charged the full-price of the selected entitlement option

steps.data:
WHEN

1. Navigating to the Settings section 

AND

1. Selecting "Restore Purchase" from the options
steps.action:
GIVEN 

1. The user has re-installed the MLB app on their device
steps.result:
THEN

1. The user will receive a "Success" message stating that their exisiting subscription has been restored

AND

1. The user receives proper playback of subscriber content as expected

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user signs into the newly created MLB account on another device
steps.action:
GIVEN 

1. A user has completed an IAP flow on their Apple TV device

AND

1. The user connects their purchase to an MLB account
steps.result:
THEN

1. The user will observe entitlements held from that account on the Settings page

AND

1. The user is able to receive playback of subscriber content

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The desired game stream launches
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user has completed a successful IAP flow

AND

2. The user attempts to play a live or archived game within their entitlements (MLB.tv / All Teams)
steps.result:
THEN

1. Playback will begin without any issues (MVPD or Blackouts may affect test)

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user signs into their Apple ID 

AND

2. Verifies their purchase on the Apple TV app
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user selects a Yearly or Monthly plan option from the Browse Subscriptions page (Choose Your Plan)
steps.result:
THEN

1. The user will be shown a successful purchase message

AND

1. The user can choose their favorite team

AND

1. The user is asked to link their anonymous IAP with an MLB account

OR

1. The user can skip linking their account and explore the app

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user selects the Get MLB.TV option on the top nav options 

OR 

+ The user selects the Get MLB.tv option from the settings menu
steps.action:
GIVEN 

+ The user has completed onboarding 

AND

+ Has selected to explore the app as a free user
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user is able Browse Subscriptions

AND

+ The user may begin the IAP flow

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user observes the Monthly segment of the IAP page
steps.action:
GIVEN 

1. The user has navigated to the MLB.tv Paywall

AND

1. The user switches their focused segment from Yearly to Monthly
steps.result:
THEN

1. All Teams Monthly copy will display
2. The (price)/monthly is displayed underneath
3. Updated copy is displayed underneath

AND

1. "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/appletv to learn more." is displayed at the bottom of the screen.

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user observes the Yearly IAP segment
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing the MLB paywall
steps.result:
THEN

+ MLB.TV All Teams copy will display
+ The (price) /yearly is displayed underneath
+ Updated copy is displayed underneath

AND

+ "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/appletv to learn more." is displayed at the bottom of the screen.

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user observes the paywall page
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user navigates to the Browse Subscriptions page from "Get MLB.tv" in settings
steps.result:
THEN

+ An MLB Logo and MLB copy will be displayed on the top-left of the page

+ "Choose your plan" header with body copy is displayed

+ Yearly and Monthly segments available

+ MLB.TV All Teams available for Yearly and Monthly subscriptions

+ MLB At Bat audio-only is available for Yearly and Monthly subscriptions (tvOS is currently not supporting an independent Audio EPG)

steps.data:
WHEN 

+ The user navigates to a mixed carousel that has features VOD, SLIVE, SVOD, and FLIVE content
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is signed into an entitled MLB-ALL account
steps.result:
THEN 

+ The user can launch and receive playback for each content type in the mixed carousel

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user is viewing the options in the list featured in the Settings page
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the top menu

AND

+ The user has selected the Settings option
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user can Log In or Log Out
+ The user can change their favorite team
+ The user can enable/disable Hide Spoilers
+ The user can navigate back to Get MLB.TV 
+ The user may restore their MLB.tv purchase
+ The user can view the URLs to the app's TOS
+ The user can view the URL for in-game support

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user navigates through this MLB upsell section
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the top menu

AND

+ The user is not logged into an account

AND

+ The user has selected the Get MLB.TV option
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user will be able to create a free account

AND

+ The user has access to browse subscriptions

AND 
+ The user can log into their account

AND

+ The user can elect to explore free content and continue using the app as a free user with no active entitlements

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user views the Sign-In options on this page
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the top menu

AND

+ The user is not logged into an account

AND

+ The user has selected the Login option
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user will be able to sign into their account through the app or by using their Apple Device

OR

+ The user has access to restore their purchase

jira.description: Scoreboard flip at 10 AM EST

steps.data:
WHEN

The time of day is before 10 AM EST
steps.action:
GIVEN

The user views the game scoreboard on the Watch, Scores, Home tabs on the following day
steps.result:
THEN

The scoreboard will display games played on the previous day

AND

The user is able to launch archive playback for games in FINAL

steps.data:
WHEN

The time of day is after 10 AM EST
steps.action:
GIVEN

The user views the game scoreboard on the Watch, Scores, Home tabs on the following day
steps.result:
THEN

The scoreboard will display games played on the current day

AND

The user is able to launch live games if available

OR

The user is able to view a No Feeds Available modal for games in preview state

steps.data:
WHEN

Selecting the calendar icon on next to the date picker buttons (Below Settings on top-right)
steps.action:
GIVEN

The user navigates to the Games page
steps.result:
THEN

The calendar view will be displayed with the Month and Year available in the header

AND

A "Today" or "Hoy" button is available on the top-right of the page

AND

The user is able to navigate to previous and future months, as well as days in the month

AND

Selecting "Today" will bring the user back to the current month > day

steps.data:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
steps.action:
GIVEN 

A logged-in user is in a location where a local team is blacked out

OR

The logged-in user is attempting to view a National game that is blacked out
steps.result:
THEN

A blackout icon is displayed on the game tile

AND

Tapping on the game tile will display the blackout message

steps.data:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
steps.action:
GIVEN

The user observes a game tile (Ex: ASG)

AND

The game is only available for users with mvpd auth credentials linked to their account
steps.result:
THEN

The user will see the MVPD Required pill displayed

steps.data:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
steps.action:
GIVEN 

The user is not-entitled to one or both feeds available in the feed picker
steps.result:
THEN 

A lock icon is displayed on the game tile or Hero

AND

The broadcast is disabled and cannot be selected

steps.data:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel, and Games page

AND

There are runners on base or outs in the inning
steps.action:
GIVEN

A game is Live and in-progress
steps.result:
THEN

Any runners on base will display on the infield icon in yellow

AND

Any outs recorded will switch the circle icon from grey to yellow

steps.data:
WHEN

The user views the game tile on the Hero, Games Carousel, or Games Page
steps.action:
GIVEN

A game is in the preview state
steps.result:
THEN

The user will see the start time displayed above the projected starting pitchers

AND

The Bases and Outs icons will be greyed out

steps.data:
WHEN 

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel, or Games page
steps.action:
GIVEN

A game is in-progress
steps.result:
THEN

The inning will be displayed on the game tile
(Ex: T1 or B2)

steps.data:
WHEN 

The user views the game tile on the hero, games carousel, or games page
steps.action:
GIVEN

A game is final
steps.result:
THEN

The winning pitcher's last name will be located next to "W" under "FINAL"

AND

The losing pitcher's last name will be located next to "L" under the winning pitcher

steps.data:
WHEN 

The user views the game tile on the hero, games carousel, or games page
steps.action:
GIVEN

A game is Live
steps.result:
THEN

The pitcher's last name will be displayed next to "P"

AND

Under the pitcher will be the current batter's last name displayed next to "AB"

steps.data:
WHEN

Viewing the game tile
steps.action:
GIVEN 

A feed is available for a game that is in-progres
steps.result:
THEN

The "Live" tag will be available (Red background, white text)

steps.data:
WHEN

A game is Live and in-progress
steps.action:
GIVEN

The user is viewing a matchup tile on the Watch or Games page
steps.result:
THEN

The Away team (Logo, Colors, and Team-code) will be displayed on the left

AND

The Home team (Logo, Colors, Team-code) will be located on the right

AND 

The score will be in the center (Ex: 0-0, 5-4)

steps.data:
WHEN

A game is in a preview state
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing a matchup tile on the Watch or Games page
steps.result:
THEN

The Away team (Logo, Colors, and Team-code) will be displayed on the left

AND

The Home team (Logo, Colors, Team-code) will be located on the right

AND

"@" will be in the center

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user views the content available to view in the Games section
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the top menu

AND

+ The user has selected the Games section
steps.result:
THEN

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user launches PiP on a video player with their multi-view session backgrounded
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user backgrounds their active multi-view session
steps.result:
THEN

1. The existing multi-view session will end completely

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user launches another game from the scoreboard to launch the multi-view feature
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing a game in PiP mode while navigating the app
steps.result:
THEN

1. The player with video and audio playback in PiP will close automatically upon entering multi-view

steps.data:
WHEN

1. A video player on the multi-view screen experiences a playback failure
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing the multi-view feature
steps.result:
THEN

1. The standard failed playback modal will display

AND

1. Only the video player that experienced the failed playback state will be removed

AND

1. All remaining players will remain intact

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user selects "Cancel" on the modal
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing multiview without the scoreboard visible

AND

1. The user selects the Menu/Back button on their remote
steps.result:
THEN

1. The modal is dismissed from view

AND

2. The video player in focus will not change

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user selects "Okay" on the exit modal
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing multiview without the scoreboard visible

AND

1. The user selects the Menu/Back button on their remote
steps.result:
THEN

1. The user will exit the multiview experience and return to a full-screen view.

AND 

1. The audio-focused video player will return to full-screen with all controls.

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user presses the Menu/Back option on the remote
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing multiview without a visible scoreboard.
steps.result:
THEN 

1. An exit modal with options "Okay" and "Cancel" are available

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user selects "Exit Multiview"
steps.action:
GIVEN 

1. The user utilizing multiview only has one video player remaining

AND

1. The "Remove" overlay on the scoreboard now displays "Exit Multiview"
steps.result:
THEN

1. The remaining video player will exit multiview

AND

1. The video player will completely return to full-screen with full controls.

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The player for that completed stream is removed from the multi-view screen automatically

THEN

1. The layout configuration will update prior to focus changes

steps.action:
GIVEN

* The user has launched multi-view

1. The user views the Dynamic Context Legend in the top-right of the multiview screen

Go fullscreen (single-press or play/ pause)
Exit multiview (back)

steps.data:

Switch audio (single-press)
Go fullscreen (play/ pause)
Exit multiview (back)

swap players (single-press),

exit multiview (back)

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user views the upper-right corner of the video player multiview screen
steps.action:
GIVEN 

1. The user has entered multiview

AND

1. The user has focused on the secondary non-audio emitting video player

switch audio (single-press)

swap players (double-press),

go fullscreen (play/ pause)

exit multiview (back)

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user taps the Menu/Back button on the remote while focused in the multi-view scoreboard
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. "Chrome" is defined by an on-screen control that is not related to the video player or scoreboard

AND

1. The chrome is visible while the user is focused on the multi-view scoreboard
steps.result:
THEN

1. The scoreboard should collapse and fade multi-view chrome

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user interacts with the remote, as well as changing the multi-view player focus
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. "Chrome" is defined by an on-screen control that is not related to the video player or scoreboard

AND

1. The chrome is visible on the multi-view screen
steps.result:
THEN

1. The 5-second fadeout timer will reset

AND

1. The 5-second fadeout timer will continue to reset until the user stops all interaction

steps.data:
WHEN

1. The user has any interaction with the remote (light trackpad swipe, single-press, double-press, etc.)
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. "Chrome" is defined by an on-screen control that is not related to the video player or scoreboard

AND

1. The chrome is not visible due to the user not utilizing the remote and video controls
steps.result:
THEN

1. The Chrome will re-appear on the video player

steps.data:
WHEN

1. There is 5 seconds of idle time
steps.action:
GIVEN 

1. "Chrome" is defined by an on-screen control that is not related to the video player or scoreboard

AND

1. The user who launched multi-view does not interact with the remote while the chrome is visible
steps.result:
THEN

1. The Chrome will disappear from the on-screen controls after 5 seconds of no interaction

steps.result:
THEN

4. The collection view scales down to make room for the games scoreboard

AND

5. The collection view returns to full-scale when the games scoreboard has been dismissed

steps.action: GIVEN an entitled user watching an MLBtv feed on tvOS

steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing broadcast options for audio feeds
steps.result:
THEN the audio feeds will be formatted as “TV/Radio” - Broadcast name - Language (Eg. Logo TV - NBCSP - Spanish”)

AND if there are more than 2 Audio options available, show them in a grid with 2 per column

steps.data: WHEN the user views the video options list
steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing broadcast options for video feeds
steps.result:
THEN the video feed will be formatted as Team logo - Team short name - broadcast name (eg. Logo PHI - NBCSP)

AND the home feed will be listed first

AND for national feeds display the broadcaster logo 

AND feeds will be disabled if user is non entitled

steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing the broadcast options menu for Video/Audio
steps.result: THEN the button should show as locked/disabled

steps.data: WHEN the user selects a new broadcast to view
steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing the broadcast options menu for Video/Audio
steps.result:
THEN selecting a video or audio feed will immediately switch the playback to that feed and close the Broadcast options panel

AND selecting a different video feed will also update the available audio options. The first audio option listed (TV feed) is automatically selected.

AND pressing Menu/Back will return the user to full video screen and closes the menu

AND

+ The user focuses on the broadcast options in the nav bar

+ The user is viewing the broadcast options menu for Video/Audio

AND

+ The user can see all available audio/video feeds

AND

+ The current feed playing will have a blue select state
 
AND

+ The audio options are only for the current selected video feed

AND

+ Selecting a new Audio or Video option will reload the video in the same place and the menu will remain open until the user manually dismisses or auto dismisses after 10 seconds.

steps.data:

+ A free game of the day is available on that date

AND

OR

+ A live game in progress  will launch from the live point (Unless hide scores is available)

steps.data:

+ The user navigates below the video scrubber to display the "Games" segment on the player overlay

AND

+ "Games" is focused on

AND

+ The home team logo, city tri-code, and run total on the right

steps.data:

+ The user navigates below the video scrubber to display the "Games" segment on the player overlay

AND

+ "Games" is focused on

+ The user launches a game from a date that does not have any other games played on it 

Example: World Series Game
steps.result:
THEN

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user views the linescore under "Details" in the video player overlay below the scrubber
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has Hide Scores enabled in their app settings

AND

+ The user launches a live or archived game
steps.result:
THEN

+ The inning markers will only display scores that match the user's progression 

AND

+ The user cannot utilize the linescore if launching from beginning

OR

+ The user can utilize the jump to inning feature or scrubbing back if at the live point

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Viewing the "Pitching" section to the right of the linescore section
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing the linescore section available in the "Details" segment of the video player overlay
steps.result:
THEN

Displayed will be:

+ Pitcher's name (first above last)
+ Pitchers's headshot
+ Pitcher's Pitch Count (EX: 100 over "PITCHES")
+ Pitcher's Inning's Pitched (EX: 6.2 over "IP")
+ Pitcher's Earned Run Avg. (EX: 2.65 over "ERA")

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Viewing the "Now Batting" section to the right of the linescore section
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing the linescore section available in the "Details" segment of the video player overlay
steps.result:
THEN

Displayed will be:

+ Batter's name (first above last)
+ Batter's headshot
+ Batter's At Bats (EX: 2-4 above "Today")
+ Batter's Average (EX: .300 above "AVG")
+ Batter's On-Base + Slugging (.800 above "OPS")

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Observing the linescore stat columns for both home and away teams
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the linescore overlay on the video player when swiping down from the scrubber and focusing on "Details"
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user will see R, H, and E for Runs, Hits, and Errors (Team totals)

AND

+ Each stat category will update as expected

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Selecting (or pressing down on the remote) a half-inning from earlier in the game

OR

+ Selecting a half-inning later in the game if streaming at an earlier playback point
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is focused on a top-half or bottom-half of an inning on the linescore
steps.result:
THEN

+ Video playback will resume at the desired point of the game

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Observing the innings markers for a live or archived game

AND

+ The game completes before 9 innings (Example: NEU vs BOS 7-Inning game on 2/23/24)
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a live or archived game 

AND

+ Has navigated to the "Details" overlay on the video player by swiping down from the scrubber
steps.result:
THEN

+ Innings 1-9 should be displayed over the top-half and bottom-half run totals for both teams

AND

+ The inning columns after the final out (EX: 8 and 9 in a 7-Inning game) will not display a "0" and will remain blank

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Observing the innings markers for a live or archived game

AND

+ The game has gone into extra innings
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a live or archived game 

AND

+ Has navigated to the "Details" overlay on the video player by swiping down from the scrubber
steps.result:
THEN

+ Innings 1-9 should be displayed over the top-half and bottom-half run totals for both teams

AND

+ After the 9th inning, a ">" marker is displayed to inform the user that more innings are available to view and jump to

AND

+ If the user has navigated to the 9th inning or later, a "<" marker will be displayed at the beginning of the linescore to inform the user that the earlier inning markers are hidden

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Observing the innings markers for a live or archived game
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a live or archived game 

AND

+ Has navigated to the "Details" overlay on the video player by swiping down from the scrubber
steps.result:
THEN

+ Innings 1-9 should be displayed over the top-half and bottom-half run totals for both teams

AND

+ If a run is scored in an inning, the total updates as expected in the correct row for the home or away team

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the "Details" overlay on the video player by swiping down from the scrubber
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a live or archived game
steps.result:
THEN

+ The away team logo will be displayed above the Home team logo

AND

+ The correct branding will be displayed

AND

+ The logos cannot be focused on

steps.data:
WHEN 

+ The user plays a video from the MLB app
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ A user playing audio from an outside app (eg Spotify)
steps.result:

AND

+ The only audio that should be heard is from the video launched from the MLB app

steps.data:
AND

+ The user presses the home button on the remote to display the quick action buttons on the PiP mini-player

AND

+ The user presses the close option or "X"
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is utilizing the PiP feature

THEN

AND

+ Audio from the content will not be heard

+ Tapping on the Apple TV home button to display the mini-player options

AND

+ The user selects the Move quick-action button on the PiP options
steps.action:
GIVEN

steps.result:
THEN

+ The user can move the mini-player to the top-right, top-left, bottom-left, or bottom-right of the MLB app

AND

+ Pressing back on the remote will snap the mini-player to that desired location on the screen

jira.summary: Pressing Home button on remote to utilize options

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user presses the Home button on their Apple TV remote (Monitor icon on 4K remote)
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has content in PiP view
steps.result:
THEN

+ The PiP Options quick-action buttons will be displayed

AND

+ The user can either Exit, Move the player, or Maximize the mini-player

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user presses the back button on their remote to navigate back to the Home page 

AND 

+ Presses the Menu button on their Apple TV remote

AND

+ Selects the "Full-screen" quick-action option
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is utilizing the PiP feature with playback

AND

+ Launches a second content in full-screen view from the Home page
steps.result:
THEN

+ The content playing in PiP mode will return to full-screen

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user presses the Menu button on their Apple TV remote

AND

+ Selects the "Full-screen" quick-action option
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is utilizing the PiP feature with playback

AND

+ Launches another content in full-screen view
steps.result:
THEN

+ The content playing in PiP mode will return to full-screen

AND

+ The secondary video will dismiss

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Launching another video tile on the page (Ensure user is entitled to games, slive, or svod)
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has selected the PiP quick action button on the video player

AND

+ Navigates to the Home page with the mini-player functioning as expected
steps.result:
THEN

+ The second video will play in full-screen with volume enabled

AND

+ The initial video in PiP continues to play on mute

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The game has switched from Live to archive

AND

+ 90 minutes has passed 

AND

+ The user attempts to launch the game
steps.action:
GIVEN 

+ The user is blacked out from viewing a live game (Local or national blackout)
steps.result:
THEN

+ The game will successfully launch without a blackout message

steps.data:
WHEN

* The user launches a live or archived game, SVOD, SLive, VOD, or FLive event from the hero tile
steps.action:
GIVEN

* The user has navigated to the Watch Now segment in the Watch section
steps.result:
THEN

* The video player will auto-launch the home or favorited team's broadcast without a feed picker, and all other mixed content successfully

steps.data: WHEN the user launches the same feed (watch live, resume, or beginning) OR a different game
steps.action: GIVEN the user is in the AppleTV app after suspending the video player from the MLB app
steps.result: THEN the user will be able to confirm playback in the MLB app at the given point selected

steps.data:
WHEN the user holds down the menu button on the ATV remote
AND the user selects the AppleTV app
steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing a game on the ATV MLB app
steps.result: THEN the user will be able to launch the same game from the AppleTV app

steps.data: WHEN the user launches the broadcast
steps.action:
GIVEN the user is viewing the HERO (Live Game)
AND the user has watched the game previously
AND Hide Scores feature is disabled
steps.result: THEN the feed will resume at the live point

steps.data: WHEN the user launches the game
steps.action:
GIVEN the user is viewing the HERO (Live Game)
AND the user has watched the game previously
AND Hide Scores feature is enabled
steps.result: THEN the feed will start from the Resume point

steps.data: WHEN the user navigates back to the previous page and tries to launch playback again
steps.action: GIVEN the user has watched the end of the broadcast to it's fullest
steps.result: THEN the "Resume" point and feature are no longer available

steps.data: WHEN the user does not resume the broadcast for 90 Days
steps.action:
GIVEN the user stopped watching a broadcast feed
AND the watch point has been bookmarked
steps.result:
THEN the resume point will expire
AND the game will no longer hold bookmarks.

jira.summary: Start from the beginning - NOT WATCHED

steps.data:
WHEN the user launches an archived feed
AND the user has never watched the broadcast
steps.action: GIVEN the user wants to watch an archived game
steps.result: THEN the user will always start the broadcast from the beginning.

steps.data:
WHEN the user selects a video feed from the feed picker
AND the user previously watched the feed
steps.action: GIVEN the user wants to watch an archive game
steps.result:
THEN the user should see options for Resume and Start from the Beginning
AND "Start from the beginning" starts the feed from the beginning of the broadcast

steps.data:
WHEN the user selects a video feed from the feed picker
AND the user has previously watched this feed
steps.action: GIVEN the user wants to watch a live game
steps.result:
THEN the user should see a "Resume" option in the next modal
AND the game feed will resume from the point where that user previously left off

steps.data: WHEN the user launches the game again
steps.action: GIVEN the user returns to a game in which they previously watched
steps.result: THEN the user will be at the same spot where they left off

steps.data: WHEN the user wishes to play/pause the content by tapping on the remote
steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing a VOD or live content
steps.result:
THEN on pausing, a pause icon will show in the middle of the screen and disappear after a second with the video still paused

AND on resuming playback, a play button will appear in the middle of the screen then disappear after a second

steps.data: WHEN the user taps on left/right with a single press
steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing a vod or live content
steps.result:
THEN a jump 15 seconds UI element will show below the scrubber
AND the flash icon should appear for 1 second.

steps.data: WHEN a user presses and holds left/right
steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing a VOD or LIVE content
steps.result:
THEN the video will FF/RW

AND releasing and pressing left/right again will increase the speed.

AND the FF/RW speed will appear below the scrubber and should update as the user increases or decreases the speed.

AND RW will stop once it reaches the beginning.

AND if the video is currently in FF and then the user presses left to RW, the FF will slow down by one step and vice versa.

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user does not interact with the remote approx. 5-10 seconds
steps.action:
GIVEN 

+ The user enters a video 

AND

+ Video controls are visible
steps.result:
THEN

+ The controls will dismiss

AND

+ When the user presses back/menu will exit the video and return the user to the previous screen they were on.

AND

+ If the are not displayed, the user can tap the trackpad to display the controls.

steps.data: WHEN the user actions the Jump to Live button
steps.action:
GIVEN the user is viewing a game on the tvOS Video Player
AND the user is behind the live point
steps.result:
THEN the feed should advance to the live point
AND the Jump to live icon is no longer visible
AND the live indicator is red

steps.data:
WHEN 

1. The user performs a single press on the remote touch pad
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing a game on their tvOS device

AND

1. The user performs a single press on the remote touch pad
steps.result:
THEN 

1. The scrubber is focused

NOTE: Sensitivity of the single press action is reduced.

steps.data: WHEN the user exits and enters a new video player
steps.action:
GIVEN a user is utilizing the video player on their tvOS app
AND the user enabled CC on another video
steps.result: THEN the CC will still remain enabled

steps.data: WHEN the user views content on the video player
steps.action:
GIVEN a user is utilizing the video player on their tvOS app
AND the user selected CC ON in the global settings
steps.result: THEN CC will be turned on

steps.data:
WHEN the user focuses on the CC button
AND the user selects CC button
steps.action:
GIVEN a user is utilizing the video player on their tvOS app
AND the user wishes to turn ON/OFF closed captioning
steps.result:
THEN the user can toggle the CC on/off
AND the button will display “Turn CC On” or “Turn CC Off” when the button is in focus

steps.data:
WHEN the user utilizes the scrubber bar
AND the user views the innings markers
steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing an archived game
steps.result:
THEN scrubber should render and display inning markers based on time position.

AND if the game does not have inning markers (spring training) do not show inning markers on scrubber.

steps.data:
WHEN the user utilizes the scrubber
AND the user is viewing the innings markers
steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing a live game
steps.result:
THEN the scrubber should render and display inning markers based on time position.

AND the inning markers should dynamically redraw to the correct position given that time is always changing.

AND after starting to watch a live game, innings markers should appear on scrubber bar as the game progresses and each half-inning is started.

jira.summary: Game Info when scrubbing and FF/RW

steps.data: WHEN the user pauses a game
steps.action: GIVEN the user pauses a game, certain UI elements should be displayed while the video is paused and should stay displayed as long as the controls are visible until normal playback speed resumes again.
steps.result:
THEN a pill above the scrubber appears with the team match up and scores

AND the inning and outs show below the scrubber.

AND the elapsed time will show above the Pill

AND the position of UI elements should track the playhead during FF/RW operations

AND the data on the UI elements should update to reflect the game state at the playhead as the user scrubs backwards and forwards.

steps.data:
WHEN the user rewinds or pauses the scrubber 
AND the user is no longer at the live point
steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing a live event
steps.result:
THEN the user can visibly see they are not currently at the live point. 
AND the live indicator will turn gray to show the user isn’t at live point.
AND the remaining text on the right shows time until live or is empty if live

steps.data: WHEN the user is viewing the video player scrubber and utilizing its features
steps.action: GIVEN the user is viewing a live event
steps.result:
THEN at the live point the scrubber bar is completely blue to show a user is at the live point

AND the end of the scrubber shows “Live” text with red indicator.

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Observing the game tile
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ A game is FINAL

AND

+ The user is navigating through the Home page or Games page
steps.result:
THEN

+ The Team Logos, Tri-code, and records will display, with the home team on the right.

AND

+ The final score will be displayed between the two teams

AND

+ FINAL copy will be displayed above the:

- Winning pitcher headshot
- "W" and pitcher's last name
- Game stats

AND

- Losing pitcher headshot
- "L" and pitcher's last name
- Game stats

AND

+ The bases and outs will be grey

AND

+ If the game was the Free Game of the Day, MVPD, Streaming on a Partner app, the pill will display

AND

+ A lock icon will display if the user is NOT entitled

AND

+ If the game tile is selected, the broadcast options will display

AND

+ The user can launched the condensed game or recap, but the game feeds will be locked

OR 

+ If entitled, the user is able to successfully launch the Away, Home feeds

steps.data:
WHEN 

+ Observing the game tile on the Home page or Games page
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ A game is LIVE
steps.result:
THEN 

The user will observe:

- The Away team's logo, tri-code, and record on the left side
- The Home team's logo, tri-code, and record on the right side
- A lock icon if the user is not entitled to the broadcasts
- A LIVE tag next to the game inning
- Pitcher headshot, "P", Last Name, and Stats
- Batter headshot, "AB", Last Name, and Stats
- Bases and Outs markers
- Occupied Bases and Outs will be displayed in yellow
- Free Game of the Day pill if applicable
- MVPD required pill if applicable
- Partnership pill if applicable

steps.data:
WHEN

+ There is a pregame show available on one or both broadcasts
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a game tile that has broadcast options available on the Home and Games pages
steps.result:
THEN

The user will observe:

- [TEAM] Pregame Show/s copy while the pregame show is in-progress
- A "LIVE" tag once game is in warm-up state (pregame show may still be airing)
- First batter with name, picture, and stats at the start of the game
- Team Logos, Team abbreviations, and records
- A Score of 0-0 
- Gray/Unfilled bases 
- Gray/Unfilled outs counter
- Apple TV+ pill if necessary
- MLB.tv Free Game of the Day pill if necessary

1. The user attempts to launch the Sunday Night Baseball game
steps.action:
GIVEN

1. A game is broadcasted on Sunday Night Baseball

AND

1. The user is logged into an account overridden to an international time zone. 

Zones: 

“Africa”: Angola, Benin, Botswana, Burkina Faso, Burundi, Cameroon, Cape Verde, Central African Republic, Chad, Comoros, The Republic of Congo, Cote d’Ivoire, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Djibouti, Equatorial Guinea, Eritrea, Eswatini, Ethiopia, Gabon, Ghana, Guinea, Guinea Bissau, Kenya, Lesotho, Liberia, Madagascar, Malawi, Mali, Mayotte, Mozambique, Namibia, Niger, Nigeria, Reunion, Rwanda, Sao Tome & Principe, Senegal, Seychelles, Sierra Leone, Somalia, South Africa, Sudan, Tanzania & Zanzibar, The Gambia, Togo, Uganda, Zambia and Zimbabwe

“Caribbean”: Anguilla, Antigua and Barbuda, Aruba, Bahamas, Barbados, Belize, Bermuda, Bonaire, British Virgin Islands, Cayman Islands, Curacao, Dominica, Dominican Republic, Falkland Islands, French Guiana, Grenada, Guadeloupe, Guyana, Haiti, Jamaica, Montserrat, Martinique, Saba, St. Barthelemy, St. Eustatius, St. Kitts and Nevis, St. Lucia, St. Martin, St. Vincent and the Grenadines, Saint Maarten, Suriname, Trinidad and Tobago, and Turks and Caicos Islands

Mexico

“Central America”: Belize, Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Nicaragua and Panama

“South America”: Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Falkland Islands, French Guiana, Guyana, Paraguay, Peru, Surinam, Uruguay and Venezuela

“Oceania” shall mean Australia, New Zealand and the Pacific Islands

“Pacific Islands” shall mean Cook Islands, Fiji, French Polynesia, Kiribati, Marshall Islands, Micronesia, Niue, Palau Islands, Samoa, Solomon Islands, Tahiti, Tokelau, Tonga and Tuvalu

“Ireland, Netherlands, & UK”: England, Netherlands, Northern Ireland, Republic of Ireland, Scotland, and Wales

AND

jira.summary: Hide Spoilers Enabled and Games Page

AND

AND

jira.summary: Hide Spoilers Enabled and Home Page

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the Home page from the top navigation menu
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing the Settings page from the top navigation menu

AND

+ The user enables Hide Spoilers, displaying "On"
steps.result:

AND

WHEN

AND

+ The user selects the Hide Spoilers option from the list
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing the Settings page from the top navigation menu
steps.result:

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Selecting Done at the bottom-right of the page
steps.action:
GIVEN

AND

steps.result:

AND

+ Sorting logic and carousels will not display changes for a team

steps.data:

+ The user selects done at the bottom-right of the page

GIVEN

AND

+ Selects the desired team to favorite
steps.result:

AND

+ The Home, Games pages will respect the changes by updating favorited logic (Prioritize in carousels, sorting)

AND

+ Page background images will update

AND

AND

AND
