steps.data:
WHEN

+ Playing back the archive stream

AND

+ Navigating through the stream by watching or scrubbing ahead
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is entitled to view an archived mlb.tv stream
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user will observe advertisements returning during ad-breaks

AND

+ Generic slate (Currently a Google Slate) will not be seen during ad-breaks

steps.data:
WHEN


+ The user navigates to the Google Ad Manager website: https://admanager.google.com/

AND

+ The user inputs the stream ID in Video > Stream Activity Monitor > Session Identifier
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has input a Stream ID url in the override menu: /ui/player/showStreamInfo:true 

(Press play button on remote 4x while focused on the Settings button while in the settings menu) 

+ The user has launched a video stream of a live or archived game
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user will see their app session return

AND

+ The user is able to observe data being sent to Google Ad Manager from their stream

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Viewing a live game that enters a commercial break
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a DM5 MLB experience account
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user can validate successful ad-drop playback, player controls, volume control, and expected return-to-game efficiency.

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The advertisement successfully begins playback

AND

+ The user attempts to use player controls on the video player
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has entered a live stream

AND

+ The game is going into a mid-inning or end-of-inning commercial break
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user is able to utilize the scrubber, FF/RW/Play/Pause buttons, and other overlay buttons without any issues

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The advertisements successfully begin playback
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has entered a live stream

AND

+ The game is going into a mid-inning or end-of-inning commercial break
steps.result:
THEN

+ The ad volume is not significantly louder or lower than the game playback volume

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The advertisements end once the game returns from commercial break
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has entered a live stream

AND

+ The game is going into a mid-inning or end-of-inning commercial break
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user will return to the game without missing any plays

AND

+ All player controls work as expected

AND

+ Volume remains consistent

steps.data:
WHEN

* The advertisement drop begins playback
steps.action:
GIVEN

* The user has entered a live stream

AND

* The game is going into a mid-inning or end-of-inning commercial break
steps.result:
THEN

* The user should not see a commercial-break slate

AND

* Ads will successfully be shown during the break without any playback issues

steps.data:
WHEN

* The stream ends and the video player closes

AND
*
# The user observes the cws.conviva.com return from the archived stream in Proxy
steps.action:
GIVEN

* The user launches an archived game

AND

* The user fast forwards to near the end of the stream
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user will observe a completion tracking return 

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14416120)

jira.summary: Verify Data Being Sent To Conviva

steps.data:
WHEN

+ The user utilizes Conviva Pulse or Touchstone
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched content and received playback
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user can observe Conviva results generated under metadata and custom metadata in Touchstone 2.0

- ![](index.php?/attachments/get/14373985)

AND

Conviva Tags Will Be Reported as: 

+ Platform Tag (plt) will be "TV_OS"
+ Media Type (med) will be lowercase
+ userid
+ gamSessionId
+ RSN VideoContentType as "RSN"

steps.data:
WHEN 

+ The user observes the cws.conviva.com return in Proxy

AND

+ views the viewType under the contents return
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user is utilizing the MLB video player multiview feature

AND

+ The user is observing Proxy returns
steps.result:
THEN

+ The viewType should display as "viewType=multiview" for all videos being streamed in the multiview feature

jira.summary: Conviva Tags For Live and Archived Games

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Observing the data returned from cws.conviva.com in Proxy

AND

+ Searching for "contentType" under Contents
steps.action:
GIVEN 

+ The user has launched a live or archived game"

AND

+ The tvOS device session is being proxied
steps.result:
THEN

+ "contentType": "Live" or "contentType": "Archive" will be returned

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Observing the "Contents" return (JSON Text View)
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The user views their proxy response for: cws.conviva.com
steps.result:
THEN

+ The contentType should return a non-MLBN label: 		

EX: "contentType": "SVOD"

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14373987)

jira.summary: Adobe Tags For Live and Archived Games
jira.description:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a live or archived game

AND 

+ The user is observing the proxy response from:
http://ans.mlb.com

steps.action:
WHEN 

+ Searching for the contentType return in the "Contents" response
steps.result:
THEN 

+ ContentType = Live or ContentType = Archived will be returned

jira.description:
GIVEN

+ The user is observing the proxy response from:

http://ans.mlb.com

steps.action:
WHEN

+ Observing the "Contents" response (Select "Form")
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user can scroll to the contentType return

AND

+ The report should return a Non-MLBN label such as:

contentType = SLive

jira.summary: Verify data is being sent to Adobe
jira.description:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched the app 

AND

+ Content playback is confirmed on device

steps.action:
WHEN

+ The user analyzes the Adobe return [https://ans.mlb.com|https://ans.mlb.com] in proxy
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user will observe the Contents returned in "FORM" view

AND

+ The following Adobe returns can be observed:

* Context
* contentType
* title (VOD)
* assetName (Game)
* Slug
* Pev2 (Action)
* contentId
* feedName (Game)
* Entitlements

jira.description: Validating Adobe analytics during onboarding when connected via proxy

steps.data:
WHEN

+ Navigating through the onboarding flow while analyzing proxy returns

AND

+ While viewing the [http://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net|http://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net] call generated
steps.action:
GIVEN

+ The apple tv device is connected to proxy

AND

+ The user launches the MLB app for the first time (May force quit and relaunch as well)
steps.result:
THEN

+ The user should observe a mid return in the CONTENTS:FORM section

 FEED SELECTION LOGIC NOTE- Play the first TV feed available for the game I’ve selected, based on this hierarchical list:
 
 
 
 Favorite team’s feed in my device’s language
 
 
 
 Home team’s feed in my device’s language
 
 
 
 Away team’s feed in my device’s language
 
 
 
 Favorite team’s feed, regardless of language
 
 
 
 Home team’s feed, regardless of language
 
 
 
 Away team’s feed, regardless of language

As an accessibilty user, when I interact with the scrubber, I would like it to read back information about its state.
 
 
 
 Scrubber - Archive
 
 
 
 When scrubber is released (touchup), the following copy should be read aloud:
 
 
 
 First, say: ”Adjustable: Media Position:”
 
 
 
 Then, say:
 
 
 
 “[Y Minutes], [Z Seconds]”, where the time read is the time the user is at since broadcast start
 
 
 
 Scrubber - Archive
 
 
 
 *When scrubber is released (touchup), the following copy should be read aloud:
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 First, say: ”Adjustable: Media Position:”
 
 
 
 Then, say:
 
 
 
 If the user is at the start of the broadcast, say “start of broadcast”
 
 
 
 If the user is at a point that is not the beginning, say: “[Y Minutes], [Z Seconds]”, where the time read is the time the user is at since broadcast start
 
 
 
 Technical Notes / Concerns
 
 * Media playing over talkback
 
 * Test on Legacy for Priority (Archive Games - MLB.tv)
 
 * iOS - possibly baseline
 
 * Best Effort to help user navigate - redesign would be ideal
 
 * Timebox to 5 points for navigation

 LIVE
 
 
 
 Notes:
 
 
 
 - If the game is tied, change to: awayTeam versus homeTeam, game is tied awayTeamRuns to homeTeamRuns.
 
 
 
 - If a game is suspended, ignore batter/pitcher info and append the following to the score: “game is suspended.”
 
 
 
 ||| Template | Examples
 
 || awayTeam versus homeTeam, gameState winningTeam leads winningTeamRuns to losingTeamRuns. ---Pitching---: pitcherName, pitcherInningsPitched innings pitched pitcherERA E.R.A. ---Batting---: batterName batterHitTotal and batterAtBatTotal. batterBattingAverage batting average.| Standard “Yankees versus Blue Jays. Top 3. Yankees lead, 3 to 0. Pitching: Bradley, 3.1 innings pitched, 3.15 ERA. Batting: Wilson, 0 and 2, .326 batting average.” Tie Game “Yankees versus Blue Jays. Bottom 4. Game is tied 0 to 0. Pitching: Bradley, 3.1 innings pitched, 3.15 ERA. Batting: Wilson, 0 and 2, .326 batting average.” Mid-Inning “Yankees versus Blue Jays. Middle 6. Game is tied 0 to 0.” Suspended. “Yankees versus Blue Jays. Game suspended. Yankees lead, 3 to 2.”
 
 
 
 FINAL
 
 
 
 Notes:
 
 
 
 - If a game did not end in 9 innings, append the total innings to the game state — gameState inningTotal innings
 
 
 
 ||| Template | Examples
 
 || awayTeam versus homeTeam, gameState. winningTeam won, winningTeamScore to losingTeamScore. The winning pitcher was winningPitcherName, winningPitcherWins and winningPitcherLosses record with a winningPitcherERA E.R.A. The losing pitcher was losingPitcherName, losingPitcherWins and losingPitcherLosses record with a losingPitcherERA E.R.A. The save pitcher was savePitcherName withsavePitcherSaves saves and a savePitcherERA E.R.A. | **Win-Loss-Save**. “Yankees versus Blue Jays, final. Yankees won 2 to 0. The winning pitcher was Wheeler. 5 and 3 record with a 2.15 ERA. The losing pitcher was Kershaw. 10 and 3 record with 3.11 ERA. The save pitcher was Neris with 10 saves and a 1.12 ERA.” **Non-Standard Inning Total**. “Yankees versus Blue Jays, final 11 innings. Yankees won 2 to 0. The winning pitcher was Wheeler. 5 and 3 record with a 2.15 ERA. The losing pitcher was Kershaw. 10 and 3 record with 3.11 ERA.”

jira.description:
GIVEN a an entitled user
 
 (NOTE: the feed selection logic is highly dependent on the user's choice of favorite and followed teams in the settings menu, and can also be effected by the device language settings. Please pay close attention to the requirements for each individual test case)

steps.action:
1. WHEN a user attempts to watch a game where one of the teams is their favorite team
 
 2. WHEN a user attempts to watch a game where one of the teams is a followed team 
 
 AND the other team is not their favorite team
 
 3. WHEN a user attempts to watch a game where they follow both teams
 
 4. WHEN a user attempts to watch a game where they don’t follow or favor either team
 
 5. WHEN the device language is Spanish 
 
 AND a Spanish language feed is available
steps.result:
1. THEN open the favorite team’s feed
 
 2. THEN open the followed team’s feed
 
 3. THEN open the feed of the higher priority team
 
 4. THEN open the feed for the home team 
 
 OR 
 
 IF no home team feed is available THEN open the away feed.
 
 5. THEN pick the Spanish feed with Spanish audio
 
 Otherwise default to English

jira.description: User must be using a Google Play Store device with an active Google Play Store account and an up to date Google Play Services

steps.action:
1. When the user navigates to the Notification Settings Screen during Onboarding
 
 and adds a favorite team
 
 2. When the user navigates to the Notification Settings Screen
 
 3. When the user toggles the global notification toggle on
 
 And when the user signs up for at least one notification type for a given team 
 
 And the user leaves the notification screen
 
 4. When the user toggles the global notification toggle OFF
 
 And the user leaves the notification settings screen
 
 5. Verify all notification types for each team
 
 6. When the user makes changes to their notification settings
 
 And the user loses connection (can force airplane mode)
 
 And the user leaves the notification settings screen
 
 7. When the user regains connection after leaving the notification screen
 
 And taps the notification in the notification tray
steps.result:
1. Then the user should see:
 
 - Global notification toggled ON
 
 - MLB News notification toggled ON
 
 - Favorite team's Game Start, Game End, Scoring Plays, and News notifications toggled ON
 
 2. Then the user should see:
 
 - A Global Notification ON/OFF Toggle
 
 - MLB News Notification Toggle
 
 - Notification Toggles for each team alert type
 
 3. Then the user should be subscribed to the notification channel
 
 And the user should begin receiving notifications for the selected channel
 
 4. Then the user should not receive notifications for any subscribed channel.
 
 
 
 (Verify with second subscribed device that notification is sent successfully.)
 
 5. Notification options for each team should be:
 
 
 
 Game Start
 
 Game End
 
 Scoring Plays
 
 Lead Change
 
 Pitching Change
 
 Condensed Game
 
 Video Highlight
 
 Team News
 
 6. Then the user should receive a notification informing them that their notification settings could not be saved. 
 
 7. Then the user should receive a notification informing them that their notification settings have been saved
 
 And when the user returns to the notification screen they should see their changes appear as they have saved them. 
 
 And when the user receives a notification that they recently signed up for and saved via the notification, they should receive the notification. (Verifying that their changes were actually sent to the service by tapping the notification.)

jira.description:
As a user going through the onboarding process, after I pass through the Welcome Screen, I must be able to select my one (1) favorite team and any number of teams to follow.
 
 
 
 - A favorite team is the first team selected by the user. A user's Favorite team will be given elevated status throughout the app. A user may only have one favorite team
 
 - Followed teams are any additional team the user chooses to select. A user may choose to follow as many teams as they like. Followed teams will have secondary priority throughout the app
 
 - A user must have a favorite team to enable followed teams
 
 - A user may choose not to set any favorite or followed teams
 
 - Display different text based on if selecting fresh or re-setting saved data.

 2. THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:
 
 
 
 Tracking Action: MLB At Bat : Android : MLB App Audio : Video Start 
 
 
 
 AND on the same call, video.assetname is populated with text of the game selected, the audio feed selected (Home or Away), AUDIO, the language (en or es) and the correct game.pk
 
 3. THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:
 
 
 
 Tracking Action: MLB At Bat : Android : GDA EPG : Play 
 
 4. THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:
 
 
 
 Tracking Action: MLB At Bat : Android : MLB App Audio : Video Start 
 
 
 
 AND on the same call, video.assetname is populated with text of the game selected, the audio feed selected (Home or Away), AUDIO, the language (en or es) and the correct game.pk
 
 5. THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:
 
 
 
 Tracking Action: MLB At Bat : Android : Video Ad Impression

Android:
EN: 8 to 72 characters
ES: 8 y 72 caracteres

ES: 1 número

ES: 1 letra mayúscula

ES: 1 letra minúscula

ES: Debe incluir al menos 1 letra mayúscula

EN: Must include at least 1 lowercase letter
ES: Debe incluir al menos 1 letra minúscula

EN: Must be at least 8 characters
ES: Debe tener entre 8 y 72 caracteres
2. THEN the following text will display with an x to the left in red
AND it will be localized

Android:
EN: Your password can only include these special characters: ~`!@#$%^&*()_-+={[}]|\:;"'<,>.?/

ES: Su contraseña sólo puede incluir estos caracteres especiales: ~`!@#$%^&*()_-+={[}]|\:;"'<,>.?/

jira.description: GIVEN a user going through the Passwordless login flow

steps.action:
1. WHEN landing on the "Enter Your Email" page
2. WHEN entering an email and tapping "Next" from the "Enter Your Email" screen
3. WHEN landing on the "Choose How to Verify" page
4. WHEN the "Send me an email to Log in" button is tapped
5. WHEN the "Reset my password" link is tapped
6. WHEN landing on the "Check Your Email" page
7. WHEN "Need Help?" is tapped from the "Choose How to Verify" screen
8. WHEN "Need Help?" is tapped from the "Check your Email" screen
9. WHEN the "Haven't received your email?" nudge displays
10. WHEN "Send Again" is tapped in the nudge
steps.result:
1. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
pageName MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Enter Email
2. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Forgot Password : Enter Email Click
action.element.index 0
action.element.text Next

Note: iOS only, not a requirment

3. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
pageName MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Verification Select

4. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Verification Select : Send Email Click
action.element.index 0
action.element.text Send me an email to Log in
5. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Verification Select : Reset Password Click
action.element.index 1
action.element.text Reset My Password
6. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
pageName MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Email Sent
7. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Verification Select : Help Click

8. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Email Sent : Help Click
action.element.text "Need Help?"
action.element.index 2
9. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Email Sent : Nudge Impression
10. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Email Sent : Nudge Click
action.element.index 0
action.element.text Send Again

jira.description: GIVEN a user has entered a valid email in passwordless flow and tapped the "Send me an email to Log in" button

jira.summary: Gesture reduction global setting default state

Currently, this will only apply Field Pass (reordering of followed players and teams).

2. Validate captions toggle.

4. Validate toggle state is saved in local storage.

2. Should be set as off as default.
3. Toggle should be functional.
4. When user re-opens the app, the preference should be saved.

4. Video should be not muted.

2. Video should be muted.

jira.description: As a user of the MLB app I want to: have the ability to set default caption behavior for the various media players in the app, as long as captions are available for the video.

3. Go to watch tab and play a video.
4. Go to news tab and play a video.
5. Turn on captions inside the video player.
steps.result:
1. Toggle should be disabled.
2. Videos should not display captions on thumbnail and also on full screen mode.
3. Videos should not display captions on thumbnail and also on full screen mode.
4. Videos should not display captions on thumbnail and also on full screen mode.
5. Captions should be enabled on the thumbnail and full screen mode, also user preferences should be changed to turn on captions in all videos (iOS only).

jira.description: As a user of the MLB app I want to: have the ability to set default caption behavior for the various media players in the app, as long as captions are available for the video.

5. Turn off captions inside the video player.

3. Phone should be set on wifi.
4. App should be re-opened
5. Videos marked as autoplay should not be autoplayed.
6. Videos marked as autoplay should be autoplayed.
7. Videos marked as autoplay should be autoplayed.
8. Videos marked as autoplay should not be autoplayed.

jira.summary: Paywall Does Not Show When Browse is Launched

steps.action: 1. Open Fresh MLB APP. During onboarding process, press skip in all steps. When home page is displayed, click on more menu before the page loads.
steps.result: 1. More menu page should be displayed. Paywall should be displayed in top of it.

steps.action: 1. Navigate to browse menu and tap on audio deeplink.
steps.result: 1. Any deep link supported by the app would open from the Browse Menu when configured

jira.description:
We’d like to ensure all of the current more menu links are supported in the new Browse Experience. This can include deep links to other areas in the app, launching links externally in your browser, launching webviews etc.

Acceptance Criteria

We’d like to have the following link capabilities:

Deep Link: Linking to native in app experiences (e.g.e Stats)

Web View Deep Link: Linking to a webpage without leaving the app (e.g. Baseball Savant)

Native Deep Link: Linking to native destinations within the app

steps.action:
1. Open MLB app and navigate to browse menu.
2. Click on any button that has a webview deeplink.
E.G. Hero Image.
3. Click on back button.
4. Force quit app. Open any text editor and type mlbatbat://webview?url=ANYURLHERE. Then click on the link.
steps.result:
1. Browse menu should be displayed correctly.
2. MLB webview screen should be displayed. Also a back buttons should be displayed at the top left.
3. Browse menu should be displayed correctly.
4. MLB webview screen should be displayed.

jira.summary: Sign Up - Show / Hide Newsletter Opt-in message
jira.description: GIVEN the Adobe activity with location mlbapp-<platform>-user-signup Adobe activity is configure and running, ex. with audience based on device locale

steps.action:
1. WHEN a device is part of the mlbapp-user-signup Adobe activity, ex. systemlocale contains "JP" because:
iOS: device Region is set to Japan
Android: Device Language is set to Japan

Notes:
-Currently iOS activity name is mlbapp-ios-user-signup
-You will need to toggle device environment to get the MLBAPP to apply a Region change
2. WHEN a device is NOT part of the mlbapp-<platform>-user-signup Adobe activity, ex. systemlocale does not contains "JP" because device Region is set to USA
steps.result:
1. THEN the newsletter opt-in message with switch does not display on the sign-up page
2. THEN the newsletter opt-in message with switch does display on the sign-up page

AND they have entered a valid password

steps.action:

AND the Next button is tapped
2. WHEN an ineligible birthdate is entered
AND the Next button is tapped
3. WHEN a birthdate is entered that is not the correct format

AND it is localized

"You are ineligible to complete the registration"

3. THEN the message below displays above the password field
AND it is localized

"Malformed birthdate. Should follow the pattern MM/DD/YYYYY."

AND a checkmark icon displays to the left of the validation text
2. THEN the text will be red
AND an 'x' icon displays to the left of the validation text

jira.summary: Sign Up - Password Validation and special character texts
jira.description:
GIVEN a user has tapped "Sign Up" from the Log In Page
AND taps the password field

steps.action:
1. WHEN anything except an invalid special character is typed in the Password field
Note: on iOS the user first opts to enter their own password (other options)
2. WHEN an invalid special character is typed in the Password field
steps.result:
1. THEN the validation texts below will display under the field
AND they will be localized

Android:
EN: 8 to 72 characters
ES: 8 y 72 caracteres

EN: 1 number
ES: 1 número

EN: 1 uppercase
ES: 1 letra mayúscula

EN: 1 lowercase
ES: 1 letra minúscula

iOS:
EN: Must include at least 1 number
ES: Debe incluir al menos 1 número

EN: Must include at least 1 uppercase letter
ES: Debe incluir al menos 1 letra mayúscula

EN: Must include at least 1 lowercase letter
ES: Debe incluir al menos 1 letra minúscula

EN: Must be at least 8 characters
ES: Debe tener entre 8 y 72 caracteres
2. THEN the following text will display with an x to the left in red
AND it will be localized

Android:
EN: Your password can only include these special characters: ~`!@#$%^&*()_-+={[}]|\:;"'<,>.?/

ES: Su contraseña sólo puede incluir estos caracteres especiales: ~`!@#$%^&*()_-+={[}]|\:;"'<,>.?/

1. THEN the pill will have a drop down where the team can be changed for the News tab
2. THEN the pill will NOT have a drop down where the team can be changed for the News tab

jira.description: GIVEN a user going through the Passwordless login flow

steps.action:
1. WHEN landing on the "Enter Your Email" page
2. WHEN entering an email and tapping "Next" from the "Enter Your Email" screen
3. WHEN landing on the "Choose How to Verify" page
4. WHEN the "Send me an email to Log in" button is tapped
5. WHEN the "Reset my password" link is tapped
6. WHEN landing on the "Check Your Email" page
7. WHEN "Need Help?" is tapped from the "Choose How to Verify" screen
8. WHEN "Need Help?" is tapped from the "Check your Email" screen
9. WHEN the "Haven't received your email?" nudge displays
10. WHEN "Send Again" is tapped in the nudge
steps.result:
1. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
pageName MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Enter Email
2. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Forgot Password : Enter Email Click
action.element.index 0
action.element.text Next

Note: iOS only, not a requirment

3. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
pageName MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Verification Select

4. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Verification Select : Send Email Click
action.element.index 0
action.element.text Send me an email to Log in
5. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Verification Select : Reset Password Click
action.element.index 1
action.element.text Reset My Password
6. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
pageName MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Email Sent
7. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Verification Select : Help Click

8. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Email Sent : Help Click
action.element.text "Need Help?"
action.element.index 2
9. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Email Sent : Nudge Impression
10. THEN an analytics call containing the following will be sent:
action MLB At Bat : <platform> : Account : Login : Email Sent : Nudge Click
action.element.index 0
action.element.text Send Again

jira.description: GIVEN a user has entered a valid email in passwordless flow and tapped the "Send me an email to Log in" button

steps.action:
1. WHEN about a minute has elapsed
2. WHEN "Send Again" is tapped
steps.result:
1. THEN the localized message "Haven't received an email? Check your email folder or Send Again" will display below "Need Help?"
2. THEN the message "The email was sent again" displays above "Need Help"
AND the email is resent

jira.description: GIVEN a user on the MLB APP after a clean install

steps.action:
1. WHEN Account Settings / Feature Flags / Flags Browser / Operational Flags / onboarding / enableMagicLinkFlow is switched on
2. WHEN Account Settings / Feature Flags / Flags Browser / Operational Flags / onboarding / enableMagicLinkFlow is switched off
steps.result:
1. THEN the “Login Without Password or Reset Password” link will display on the login page

Note: after switching the setting on, the link will immediately show but you must restart the MLB App for it to work
2. THEN "Reset Password" link will display on the login page

jira.summary: Invalid Email on "Enter your Email" screen

steps.action:
1. WHEN an improperly formatted email is entered (ex. no @ and .com)
2. WHEN a properly formatted but invalid email is entered
AND Next is tapped
steps.result:

2. THEN nothing should happen

jira.summary: Gesture reduction global setting default state
jira.description: As a user of the MLB app I want to: have the ability to reduce gesture controls by enabling the use of buttons as alternatives when drag and drop (or other gesture) is the only means of interaction. Currently, this will only apply Field Pass (reordering of followed players and teams).

steps.action:
1. Go to account settings
2. Validate captions toggle.
3. Validate toggle can be enabled/disabled.
4. Validate toggle state is saved in local storage.
steps.result:
1. Account settings page should be displayed.
2. Should be set as off as default.
3. Toggle should be functional.
4. When user re-opens the app, the preference should be saved.

jira.description: As a user of the MLB app I want to: have the ability to set default caption behavior for the various media players in the app, as long as captions are available for the video.

steps.action:
1. Go to account settings and disable mute toggle.
2. Go to home feed and play a video that has captions.
3. Go to watch tab and play a video.
4. Go to news tab and play a video.
5. Mute a video.
steps.result:
1. Toggle should be disabled.
2. Video should be not muted.
3. Video should be not muted.
4. Video should be not muted.
5. video should be muted, also user preferences should be changed to mute all videos (iOS only).

jira.description: As a user of the MLB app I want to: have the ability to set default caption behavior for the various media players in the app, as long as captions are available for the video.

steps.action:
1. Go to account settings and enable mute toggle.
2. Go to account settings and enable mute toggle.
3. Go to watch tab and play a video.
4. Go to news tab and play a video.
5. un mute a video.
steps.result:
1. Toggle should be enabled.
2. Video should be muted.
3. Video should be muted.
4. Video should be muted.
5. video should be not be muted, also user preferences should be changed to un mute all videos (iOS only).

jira.description: As a user of the MLB app I want to: have the ability to set default mute behavior for the various video players in the app, as long as volume options are available for the video.

steps.action:
1. Go to account settings
2. Validate mute toggle.
3. Validate toggle can be enabled/disabled.
4. Validate toggle state is saved in local storage.
steps.result:

2. Toggle should disabled as default.
3. Toggle should be functional.
4. When user re-opens the app, the preference should be saved.

jira.description: As a user of the MLB app I want to: have the ability to set default caption behavior for the various media players in the app, as long as captions are available for the video.

steps.action:
1. Go to account settings and disable captions toggle.
2. Go to home feed and play a video that has captions.
3. Go to watch tab and play a video.
4. Go to news tab and play a video.
5. Turn on captions inside the video player.
steps.result:
1. Toggle should be disabled.
2. Videos should not display captions on thumbnail and also on full screen mode.
3. Videos should not display captions on thumbnail and also on full screen mode.
4. Videos should not display captions on thumbnail and also on full screen mode.
5. Captions should be enabled on the thumbnail and full screen mode, also user preferences should be changed to turn on captions in all videos (iOS only).

jira.description: As a user of the MLB app I want to: have the ability to set default caption behavior for the various media players in the app, as long as captions are available for the video.

steps.action:
1. Go to account settings and enable captions toggle.
2. Go to home feed and play a video that has captions.
3. Go to watch tab and play a video that has captions.
4. Go to news tab and play a video that has captions.
5. Turn off captions inside the video player.
steps.result:
1. Toggle should be enabled.
2. Videos should display captions.
3. Videos should display captions on thumbnail and also on full screen mode.
4. Videos should display captions on thumbnail and also on full screen mode.
5. Captions should be disabled on the thumbnail and full screen mode, user preferences should be changed to turn off captions in all videos (iOS only).

jira.description: As a user of the MLB app I want to: have the ability to set default caption behavior for the various media players in the app, as long as captions are available for the video.

steps.action:
1. Go to account settings
2. Validate captions toggle.

steps.result:

4. When user reoppens the app, the preference should be saved.

jira.description: Migrate and confirm functionality still works as expected

steps.action:
1. Go to account settings and tap on autoplay video button.
2. Tap on never autoplay videos.
3. Make sure phone is on a wifi.
4. Re-open app.
5. Go to home feed and validate videos are only autoplayed when in wifi connection.
6. Go to watch tab and validate videos are only autoplayed when in wifi connection.
7. Go to news tab and validate videos are only autoplayed when in wifi connection.
8. Re-run steps 4-6 with phone set to mobile data
steps.result:
1. Autoplay screen should be displayed.
2. Option should be selected.
3. Phone should be set on wifi.
4. App should be re-opened
5. Videos marked as autoplay should not be autoplayed.
6. Videos marked as autoplay should be autoplayed.
7. Videos marked as autoplay should be autoplayed.
8. Videos marked as autoplay should not be autoplayed.
